name: places/ChIJxfWXSQdZwokRGLy1wXqtTJo
formattedAddress: 37 St Marks Pl, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 37 St Marks Pl, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: First of all, love the product diversities, and wide range of selections. However, a person came to me and tried to help me find a product, but I had a hard time communicating with her (in English), I'm not being rude here, but why would a store have sales without verbal proficiency in English and she even handed to me an item that's totally not what I asking for, and labeled with high pricing. Later at the counter, when I asked the cashier, I was been told that she was the store manager, which was even funnier.

originalText.text: Some of the stuff they sell is cheaper than teso down the block, and they have some items I havenâ€™t seen carried elsewhere. Like others have mentioned, it is uncomfortable to shop there - Iâ€™m asian and have also been followed around the store - but I usually just ignore them and get what I need.

originalText.text: Came across this store by accident when the Kuromi plushies caught my eye. I went in and the employees made eye contact and I just smiled, greeted them, and grabbed a basket. The products were expensive, but they have a lot of cute stuff, even a wide selection of korean and Japanese skincare and makeup. I mainly went there for the Kuromi products and they were so adorable. I was pretty much up and down the aisles over and over again cause I was trying to put back stuff and fighting off the impulse of wasting money on things I donâ€™t need. Nobody was in my space nor did they give me any trouble. Even at checkout the employees were very nice and friendly toward me. Definitely will come back again when Iâ€™m in area. This store is not healthy for my wallet. ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­

originalText.text:
My friends and I went to this store and was followed throughout the store by 3 of the employees! Not to mention- when me and one of my friends was having a conversation about one of the items in the store, one of the employees stood directly across from us, leaned on a wall and stared me down!
I ended up purchasing an item for my friend which I completely regret! I will NEVER go back to this store and I wouldnâ€™t recommend anyone going there as well!!
There are other stores that value their customers and donâ€™t follow them around like they did to us!!

originalText.text: I read the reviews about staff following you so i went in to verify myself lol. Approved, the minute i stepped in they looked at me intently. 2 workers followed me around and every time they passed they made sure to look me top to bottom to make sure i hadnâ€™t hidden anything in my pockets. Only after i picked a few things up and was evidently actually shopping they were super nice. 2 stars just for changing your tone. Do better, this racist behaviour is really a disgusting look.
